posts.post_content:
I’m on the hunt for N162 baseball subjects. Can purchase for cash or work on a trade (my trade bait is T206s, as I don’t have a built out 19th century collection). 

Raw or graded. Happy to see what you have!

All the best,
Todd Helfrich

Just wanted to repost my interest in N162 baseball subjects. 

Have cash or T206 HOFers for potential trade.
